com.fuse.ui

Class EventNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fuse.ui.TouchReceiver
      • com.fuse.ui.Node
        • com.fuse.ui.EventNode

  • public class EventNode
extends Node
    Custom Node type that extends the Node class with two events; drawEvent and updateEvent, which are triggered in respectively the draw() and update(float dt) methods. Using Events in the update and draw loops could strongly affect performance, therefore this class is primarily menat for development and prototyping purposes. For slightly better performance, consider using the LambdaNode.
